name: Instituto de Investigaciones Matematicas, Luis A. Santalo
membership:
Universidad de Buenos Aires
CONICET (Consejo Nacional de Investigaciones Cientificas y Tecnicas
goal:
The promotion of activities of cooperation among researchers in Mathematics.

The IMAS will work within the Mathematics Department of the Faculty.

To contribute to the dissemination of mathematics through conferences, seminars, colloquia, publication of research articles, etc.

Promote their scientific activities with other centers, institutes and universities, both in the country and abroad, allowing the exchange of researchers and fellows, who will work together on different projects.

Provide an environment conducive to study and research in Mathematics, promoting the development of infrastructure necessary for these purposes.
interests: Communication, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Marie Skłodowska-Curie Actions (MSCA)
Research and Innovation Staff Exchange (RISE)
H2020-MSCA-RISE-2017
